ListElement: The child/children has/have a history of absconding and is/are likely to abscond from any other accommodation and if the child/children abscond he/she/they is/are likely to suffer significant harm.
If the child/children is/are kept in any other accommodation, the child/they is/are likely to injure himself/herself/themselves or other people.
The approval of the Secretary of State to the placement of the child/children in secure accommodation has been granted and is attached.
